    • Uses of BoardException in abalone

      Methods in abalone that throw BoardException 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void Game.addMove​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String direction, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> indexes)
      Will check if the player is on turn and check if the move is valid, will move if both true.
      void Game.checkScore()
      checks if a player /team has reached the score limit, if it is reached, the game finished message will be send.
      int Board.getNeighbour​(int index, java.lang.String direction)
      Given the index and direction, returns the neighbor index in that direction.
      int Board.getScore​(Marble marble)
      Get the score of the given marble.
      int Board.indexToProtocol​(int index)
      given board model index, returns the index according the protocol.
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> Board.indexToProtocol​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> indexes)
      given board model index, returns the index given in the protocol.
      boolean Board.move​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> indexes, java.lang.String direction)
      moves all indexes in the list to the given direction.
      int Board.protocolToIndex​(int index)
      Converts the protocol index to our own index board model index.
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> Board.protocolToIndex​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> indexes)
      Returns an ArrayList with the numbers from protocol indexes converted to the board model indexes.
